info.title: API-Football
info.description: REST API for football data including live scores, fixtures, and player stats.

get.description: Returns the API status and server time.
Retrieve football match fixtures. Supports fetching the last and next fixture of a specific team.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: The ID of the team to fetch fixtures for.

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: The number of past fixtures to retrieve (e.g., 1 for last fixture).

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: The number of upcoming fixtures to retrieve (e.g., 1 for next fixture).

get.description: Retrieve details of football teams using either team name or team ID. If multiple teams are found, only the first one is returned initially. If the first team is incorrect, additional teams can be retrieved by iterating through the response.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the team (if ID is not known).
